Reviews.Title: Turned out to be a european product`
Reviews.Author: cheyenne guillois
Reviews.Content: Do not order the EW version as it is a European product and will not work out of the box with a US coax in. It does not have a coax in connection and in fact has the European antenna plug.  Even after buying an adapter it still work not work directly with a coax connection.  Works fine with a cable box and an HDMI in.  But even the menu does not allow one to select USA as the location.  I also had to order a USA power cable as it came with a European power cable.  I do not think Amazon should be selling European electronics on an American web site.  I would say just buy a USA model if you are looking for this kind of product.

Reviews.Title: Geezer Review
Reviews.Author: Abe Baldwin "Abe"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely excellent product. Works well with computer input, cable, and over the air antenna. Brilliant high res screen. Worked right out of box.

Reviews.Title: review of tv purchase
Reviews.Author: david mauer
Reviews.Content: after ordering another product with good results, I ordered a Samsung tv, shipping free from amazon, which processed thru a german company alb computer. after receiving the tv, I could not get it to play, so I hired a tv company for $50.00 to program the tv and after they came out to program tv, the service tech said this tv would never work because it was programed for the Romanian market and would never work for the us market system.  the cables connections would not work, the dvd sent for help on install woujld not work-Romanian system again--I contacted amazon and florian from alb contacted me via email and suggested I order new cables----he did not have a clue as to the problem!  then a get a call from the shipper ups, wanting $16.67 for custom fees on a shipping free order--alb computer finally ask me to return unit, which I had to go to the computer on line and print up return shipping papers after a girl from alb called me getting all info for the return, which she said she would print  up, but the next day, I found out that I would have to do, which I did and called ups for the return--after ups pick-up--I got a call from ups, that they needed a commercial invoice for the customs return to Germany,which I had to contact alb to get and get to ups for the completion of return-----I would avoid buying anything from amazon in the future!  ps--bought the Samsung tv from best buy for $50.00 less

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung T23B350 23 Inch Widescreen Led Tv/Monitor With Digital Tv Tuner - Gloss Black (Full 1080P, Dolby Digital +, Hdmi, Vga, Usb, Scart)
